org.jetel.graph

Interface OutputPort

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    OutputPortDirect
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConcurrentOutputPort, Edge, JobflowEdge

    public interface OutputPort
    An interface defining operations expected from OutputPort object Output port establishes unidirectional communication channel between two NODEs.
    Since:
    April 2, 2002
    See Also:
    InputPort, Node, Edge

    • Method Summary

      use eof() method instead
